text: Today is a 1930 American drama movie directed by William Nigh and is the second version of the 1913 play of the same name by George Broadhurst.Pitts p.223 It stars Conrad Nagel, Catherine Dale Owen, Sarah Padden, John M. Sullivan, Judith Vosselli and was distributed by Majestic Pictures. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1930 drama movies Category:1930s American drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by William Nigh Category:Black-and-white movies
title: Today (1930 movie)
